Keywords: Asgardian , Deity , Mystical , Ruler
Real Name: Hela
Special Powers
TARGETING: Characters
A GATHERING OF THE DEAD: Whenever a standard character is KO'd by an effect opposing to them, generate a Grave marker in the square they occupied. // POWER: Generate Draugr Warrior bystanders in all unoccupied squares with Grave markers within range, then remove each of those Grave markers. Gain 1 MISSION POINT for each Draugr Warrior generated this action.
COMMANDING THE DEAD: Leadership, Mastermind. When Hela uses Leadership and succeeds, you may instead generate a Grave marker.
Figure Errata
Changed A GATHERING OF THE DEAD
Trade Hela Want Hela

guyncognito
I want to pair her with Dormammu from Avengers Forever; I've had excellent luck spawning mindless ones and Baron Mordo (who also spawns mindless ones) and then I have a swarm of minions with mystics damage to kill and turn into grave markers. On paper, it sounds like it should work (and maybe get some mission points rolling???)

shawn11189
Let me guess the gathering of the dead use to say any ko not ko from just opposing right?
March 2, 2022
tidge
I like this dial design for Hela... dare I saw that it feels true to the character and it looks cost-balanced (post-errata)? I especially like the IMPROVED Targeting, as lines-of-fire being from 'bosses' blocked by friendlies is pet peeve of mine. Traited Mastermind is also a blessing for boss-level characters. It also feels balanced that she doesn't get BSTs for nothing. I can imagine additional ways the dial could have been tweaked to improve her staying power, but not every figure needs to be OP to be fun.

Errata reads: 048 Hela [E] A GATHERING OF THE DEAD: Whenever a standard character is KO'd [COLOR="Red"]by an effect opposing to them[/COLOR], generate a Grave marker in the square they occupied. // POWER: Generate Draugr Warrior bystanders in all unoccupied squares with Grave markers within range, then remove each of those Grave markers. Gain 1 MISSION POINT for each Draugr Warrior generated this action.
